about_the_game:
Welcome, curious minds and eager hands! Come in, come in, for here at Labyrintheam we have challenges more twisted than tavern gossip and more turns than a reheated stew.

If you’re one who enjoys testing your wits, you’ve come to the right place. I warn you, stranger, a strong shield won’t be enough here. No, no… you’ll need brains and cleverness.

Each room will present you with a puzzle… a door that holds your freedom. But it won’t open willingly; you’ll have to figure out what trick it needs to let you through. Maybe it’s about choosing the right order, finding the correct symbol, or even handling objects in ways as twisted as the spell of a drunk wizard.

I warn you, strangers, logic and coordination between you and your partner will be as necessary as air. This challenge is a task for two, like wine and a mug, or bread and soup. Watch each threshold closely, and mind your step, for a wrong move is as treacherous as cheap wine.

You’ll find rooms where the walls have eyes and the clocks have no patience, filled with mysteries and surprises that, I assure you, will make you doubt even the echo of your own steps.

So go ahead, intrepid souls! In Labyrintheam, you don’t get out alone, no, no! Here, collaboration is key, or you’ll end up as tavern decorations. Remember, the door only opens when two heads think together.

Good luck, strangers! And may the winds of fortune always blow in your favor!

content_descriptors.notes: There is presence of blood constantly, even included in the main game, being needed to see it and interact with it to solve the puzzles.

name: LabyrinTheam

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB DirectX 9 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Welcome to the Labyrintheam Tavern! Where we serve riddles that will test your wit and ingenuity. In this game, you will team up to escape from rooms filled with mysteries. Use your brains to open the door that will help you escape. Good luck to you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal
